description: This file is a C header (.h) file defining exported API functions for a Content Filtering component, specifically related to Access Key management within the BroadWay Service Delivery System.

methods.name: ContFilterCreateAccessKey
methods.description: Creates an access key object, taking container, owner, and reserved handles as parameters.

methods.name: ContFilterAkoCreate
methods.description: Creates a Content Filter Access Key object with container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: ContFilterAkoRemove
methods.description: Removes and deallocates the specified access key object.

methods.name: ContFilterAkoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects for the access key management.

methods.name: ContFilterAkoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the access key object post-creation.
